arguments.prompt: A woman walks away from a white Jeep parked on a city street at night, then ascends a staircase and knocks on a door. The woman, wearing a dark jacket and jeans, walks away from the Jeep parked on the left side of the street, her back to the camera; she walks at a steady pace, her arms swinging slightly by her sides; the street is dimly lit, with streetlights casting pools of light on the wet pavement; a man in a dark jacket and jeans walks past the Jeep in the opposite direction; the camera follows the woman from behind as she walks up a set of stairs towards a building with a green door; she reaches the top of the stairs and turns left, continuing to walk towards the building; she reaches the door and knocks on it with her right hand; the camera remains stationary, focused on the doorway; the scene is captured in real-life footage.
arguments.negative_prompt: worst quality, inconsistent motion, blurry, jittery, distorted
